Package entity.btoProject

Class BTOProject

java.lang.Object
entity.btoProject.BTOProject
public class BTOProject extends Object
Represents a Build-To-Order (BTO) project with details about flats, officers, and application periods.

  • Constructor Details

    • BTOProject

      public BTOProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, int twoRoomUnits, double priceTwoRoom, int threeRoomUnits, double priceThreeRoom, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, HDBManager managerInCharge, int maxOfficerSlots)
      Constructs a BTOProject instance.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      neighborhood - The neighborhood where the project is located.
      twoRoomUnits - The number of 2-room units available.
      priceTwoRoom - The price of a 2-room unit.
      threeRoomUnits - The number of 3-room units available.
      priceThreeRoom - The price of a 3-room unit.
      openingDate - The application opening date.
      closingDate - The application closing date.
      managerInCharge - The manager in charge of the project.
      maxOfficerSlots - The maximum number of officer slots.

      public boolean isWithinApplicationPeriod(LocalDate date)
      Checks if the given date is within the application's opening and closing period.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check.
      Returns:
      True if the date is within the application period, false otherwise.
